s: My all time favourite beer is Erdinger Dunkel. Just a shame it can be so expensive buying online, probably due to the weight of shipping it. It's a lovely dark drink with undertones off toffee, liquorice and caramel but none of the horrible aftertaste that some strong beers can have. Would recommend anyone to try it. ...
